```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(ROCR)
library(knitr)
library(readr)
dt <- read_csv("./data/bigrams3.csv", na = "NA")
source("./library.R")

```

##Iteration 2:


#### K-Fold
```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

print(paste0("Total Number of Rows: ",nrow(dt)))
index<-sample(nrow(dt),round(nrow(dt)*0.8))
train <-dt[index,]
test <-dt[-index,]

```

## Test classifeir with Train data

```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}


train.subset<- train[1:round(nrow(train)/5),]
avg.score   <- combiner(train,train.subset)
logestic.res<- logestic.regresion(train,train.subset)
svM.res     <- sVM(train,train.subset)
tree.res    <- decision.tree(train,train.subset)



ggplot(NULL,aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(avg.score,train.subset[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Average"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(logestic.res,train.subset[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Logestic Regresion"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(svM.res,train.subset[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "SVM"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(tree.res,train.subset[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Decision Tree"))+
  labs(title= "ROC curve", x = "False Positive Rate",y = "True Positive Rate")
```
#### AUC Train


```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}

avg<-AUC(avg.score,train.subset[,797])
logestic.regression<-AUC(logestic.res,train.subset[,797])
svm<-AUC(svM.res,train.subset[,797])
decission.tree<-AUC(tree.res,train.subset[,797])

dt<-data.frame(method=c("logestic Regression","Decision Tree","SVM","Average"),AUC=c(logestic.regression,decission.tree,svm,avg))

kable(dt)
```

#### Test classifeir 

```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
avg.score <- combiner(train,test) 
logestic.res <- logestic.regresion(train,test)
svM.res    <- sVM(train,test)
tree.res   <- decision.tree(train,test)
ggplot(NULL,aes(x=x,y=y))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(avg.score,test[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Average"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(logestic.res,test[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Logestic Regresion"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(svM.res,test[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "SVM"))+
  geom_line(data=rocCurve(tree.res,test[,797]),size = 1,aes( color = "Decision Tree"))+
  labs(title= "ROC curve", x = "False Positive Rate",y = "True Positive Rate")
```

#### AUC Test

```{r warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}


avg<-AUC(avg.score,test[,797])
logestic.regression<-AUC(logestic.res,test[,797])
svm<-AUC(svM.res,test[,797])
decission.tree<-AUC(tree.res,test[,797])

dt<-data.frame(method=c("logestic Regression","Decision Tree","SVM","Average"),AUC=c(logestic.regression,decission.tree,svm,avg))

kable(dt)
```
